Name: Streets Ablaze
About the game: Streets Ablaze is a 3D side-scrolling beat em' up inspired by the arcade and console games we played growing up. Take control of one of the three heroes and hit the streets. Fight alongside a friend in this side-scrolling adventure. Fight against cronies and minions, unleashing powerful combos and special attacks. Streets Ablaze takes you on a wild ride that spans different dimensions, eras, and environments. Chase down the evil Lord Blackhorn and battle a wide range of foes.
